FuncDef: The display erps command displays information about ERPS rings and ports that are added to the ERPS rings. The display erps command displays information about ERPS rings and ports that are added to the ERPS rings. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about a specified ERPS ring and ports that are added to the ERPS ring.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

Displays detailed information about ERPS rings and ports that are added to the ERPS rings.
